review:
this one of the worst movie ever made by puri jagannath. except locations and good acting of balakrishna there is nothing in this movie.
pathetic screenplay,no emotional touch,worst and dumb comedy scenes,below average bgm,brainless action sequences. 
a complete wastage of time
ratings:2/10 stars.
puri jagannath you have the potential to make good movies, take time and work more your on direction style and screenplay then you will definitely succeed.

balayya is the greatest comedy actor of all time..he is doing a great service to humanity by making such movies..everytime i get stressed i watch a balayya movie..it provides non stop comedy material and u laugh your heart out for 2.5 hrs completely relueving you of all stress ..this movie has an added bonus - he has also sung a song ‚ò∫Ô∏è keep it up balayya

mindless movie brainless movie.. paisa wasool is wrong actually its waste of time and money movie oo.. audience plz choos good movies and pramote good movies its upon uu to make any one hero or zero plz dont come in the trapa like... fans kosam always ready .... etc
if you want to really enjoy the movie you should watch balayyabaabu movie. and paisa vasool is the best mark of entertainment along the cast of puri jagannath and baalayya babu. its awesome.

it is illogical according to some of the scences but still its amazing and as u know tamil and telugu movies r unforgettable and nice so u should watch it
                       thank you

a mass masala movie with twists that are out dated. the balayya factor too doesn't work well due to his screaming at many occasions.

avoidable !!

typical balayya movie & also puri entertainer..mass movie..nice locations songs n fights..fully enjoyed..powerful dialogues..thanks puri..i liked this theda singh..highlight balayya's song..nagin dance..
